page.title: 07EDUCATION IN BURNESTON AREA
page.content: Burneston Church of England Primary School has three teachers who each take a class. Class 1 is taken by Mrs. Blakey, the Headmistress and is all infants. Class 2 is taken by Mrs. Thompson and is 1st.and 2nd. year juniors, while Class 3 is taken by Mr. Place, Deputy Head, and is 3rd. and 4th. year juniors. Mrs.Hill is a part-time teacher who comes in the mornings to help with the infants. In September 1985 there will be 25 children in each class. Meals are cooked on site by Mrs. Mackenzie. Mrs.Stones is the cleaner/ caretaker. As most of the children come by bus, we start at 8.45 a.m. and finish at 3.15. p.m. to fit in with the transport of secondary children to Bedale. Dinner is from 11.50.a.m. to 12.50. p.m.
